pkgmetadata.longdescription: ---This guide will help you setup the Ingestion framework and connectors---![Python version 3.7+](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.7%2B-blue)OpenMetadata Ingestion is a simple framework to build connectors and ingest metadata of various systems through OpenMetadata APIs. It could be used in an orchestration framework(e.g. Apache Airflow) to ingest metadata.**Prerequisites**- Python >= 3.7.x### DocsPlease refer to the documentation here https://docs.open-metadata.org/connectors
